EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-18-Los Angeles Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-10-12.EMAIL - Ma
EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CALL - Los Angeles Kings vs Canadiens
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We have a limited number of seats left and we hope you will join us Wednesday, October 18th, as the Kings take on the Canadiens at the Staples Center. We're looking forward to good drinks, great food, and our community of awesome technologists for an evening of hockey and networking. Can you join us? Los Angeles Kings vs Montreal Canadiens <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
Where: Staples Center 1111 S. Figueroa, Los Angeles, CA 90015 Wednesday, October 18th 7:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
Last call!
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
